articles.author: DAVID RISING, JINTAMAS SAKSORNCHAI
articles.title: Australian tourist dies after drinking tainted alcohol in Laos, raising toll to 4 including American - The Associated Press
articles.description: An Australian teenager has died after drinking tainted alcohol in Laos in what Australia’s prime minister on Thursday called every parent’s nightmare. An American and two Danish tourists also died, officials said after reports that multiple people had been si…
